mapper.sql: SR_ID, SD_TYPE, SD_OS, SD_OSTYPE, SR_TYPE, SR_RNAME, SR_RULES, SR_DATE
mapper.insert: insert into SE_RULES (SR_ID, SD_TYPE, SD_OS, SD_OSTYPE, SR_TYPE, SR_RNAME, SR_RULES, SR_DATE) values (#{srId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sdType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sdOs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sdOstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{srRname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srRules,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{srDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into SE_RULES
SR_ID,
SD_TYPE,
SD_OS,
SD_OSTYPE,
SR_TYPE,
SR_RNAME,
SR_RULES,
SR_DATE,
#{srId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{sdType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sdOs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sdOstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{srType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{srRname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{srRules,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{srDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update SE_RULES
SD_TYPE = #{sdType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SD_OS = #{sdOs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SD_OSTYPE = #{sdOstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SR_TYPE = #{srType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SR_RNAME = #{srRname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SR_RULES = #{srRules,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SR_DATE = #{srDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where SR_ID = #{srId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update SE_RULES set SD_TYPE = #{sdType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SD_OS = #{sdOs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SD_OSTYPE = #{sdOstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SR_TYPE = #{srType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SR_RNAME = #{srRname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SR_RULES = #{srRules,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SR_DATE = #{srDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where SR_ID = #{srId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT concat(SD_OS,' ',SD_OSTYPE) AS 'SD_OS',SR_TYPE,SR_RNAME,SR_RULES FROM SE_RULES WHERE SD_TYPE='终端设备';
